name: Moor (itch)
description:
A long forgotten kingdom found inside the mountain of Moor were sealed off a long time ago, but no one really knows why. Delve deep into the mountain and discover what really happend beyond the moutain walls.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Moor is a 3D first person pixel-styled roguelite dungeon crawler with random dungeons. Delve deep into the mountain as you fight enemies and bosses, solve puzzles and find treasures! But beware, as death will set you all the way back to the start! You get to keep the gold you've found tho.

  • Moor was released on Steam 20. december 2019, but now I'd like to share it here as well!
  • With version 1.1.6, Moor as been released to itch.io and Gamejolt.com
  • Check out Moor's website for news and updates!
  • Also check out Moor's Steam page.
  • Requires 7-zip / winrar.
  • Requires DirectX.
